title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: July 16, 2022, 12:05:57 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 07:30:12 AM by the rise
content: BOUNTY STOP            Campaign introductionBounty Campaign Dates: July 16 - Aug 12 lasts for 4 weeks.Tokens will be distributed to participants within 10 days after the end of the Bounty Campaign.Tokens will be distributed to participants before Aug 22 to the participants' BSC (bep 20) addresses.$15,000 worth $Lumin tokens will be distributed to this bounty campaign. (up to 50% more, and 21 billiion coins depending on price)Illuminati Coin (Lumin) IntroductionLumin Coin is a meme coin that's revolutionzied monetary designs. It is the world's first currency to combine the best attributes of both fiats and prior cryptos.The overaching goal of Lumin is to help bring a better and more democratic monetary world, and it is doing so by facilitating the first direct democracy over monetary policies. In effect, it could be as adaptable (like raising interest rates during worsening inflation) as any centralized systmes, but with much more transparency, democracy and decntralization.Step by step, it could become the best currency and DAO for the future.Terms And ConditionsParticipants should Join Lumincoin on social media: - Telegram group - Twitter - discord - Medium You receive stakes for completing campaign tasks, after the end of the bounty campaign, stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula:bounty tokens = number of your stakes / total number of stakes* allocated total number of tokensBounty related issues and spam messages are forbidden in the project 's official group/pages. Ask boundty related questions in LuminBounty or CMBM servicesCheating and using bots are strictly forbidden, cheating participants could be disqualifiedFollow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: LuminCoin Chat, LuminBounty, CMBMservice You may make reports every day! (or at least every 7 days) Do not quote your old report!You may enter the same campaigns twice if you have different applicable accounts, but you would need to make a separate proof of authentication post with a different email address) Format for proof of authentication post: (Email is optional, but if you apply for same campaigns twice, we'd need different emails to count stakes seperately) [/list]Code:Proof of authentication:- Forum Username:- Email:- BSC (bep 20) address:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:WEEK 1 : 16/07 - 22/07WEEK 2 : 23/07 - 29/07WEEK 3 : 30/07 - 05/08WEEK 4 : 06/08 - 12/08Important:1. Read the Rules from the bounty thread carefully.2. Please read the Disclaimer carefully.Bounty Awards:Daily Stake = 1 Stake x Multiplier 1 x Mutipler 2 x Multiplier 3   (1 stake if completed daily task)Multiplier 1 (Follower Counts)500 to 1500 followers: x11501 to 5000 followers: x25001 - 10000 followers: x310001 - 50000 followers: x550000+ followers: x7Multiplier 2 (Twitter Audit Score: From https://www.twitteraudit.com/)90-100%: x180%-90%: x0.970%-80%: x0.860%-70%: x0.7<60%: x0Multiplier 3 (Account Status: From https://shadowban.yuzurisa.com/)All normal: x1.25Only Search/Search Suggestion Ban: x1The Above Ban Plus Unknown (website displays technical issues): x0.8ghost ban/deboosted to 0.44Rules:● Make 1 post every day. May include Information from the official website or Twitter. May include 1-3 hashtags. (example: #LuminCoin #BestDAO #DirectDemocracy #MemeCoin)● Make 1 repost every day if there's a new post @LuminCoin. Like a post when reposting. Your post may include 1-3 hashtags (example: #LuminCoin #BestDAO #DirectDemocracy #MemeCoin).●  Must Follow the official Twitter @LuminCoin  How to join:Fill out the registration form here: Twitter Campaign Report Format:(Post the links to your posts in this thread every 1-7 days as a new post. Stakes will be counted on a daily basis. Do not quote or edit your previous report.)Code:Twitter Campaign Report- Forum Username:- Twitter Username:- For date(s): XX- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #1....  Bounty Awards : Posts in other groups: 3 Stakes/day ( 3 posts per day)Don't post in the main group, unless you ask(6 stakes one time award (paused, prior participants still receive the stakes)Rules:●Posts in other groups must be in active groups. Posts in spam groups or groups with 90%+ bot meesages (like price charts) do not count:●Hard shilling counts as one post. Soft shilling by 2+ accounts counts as multiple posts.examples:-LuminCoin is cool haha.-Website?-Hmm, you may search it, I just like the idea, that with it you could vote for your own monetary policies.(counts as 3 daily stakes, if posted in a non-spam active group from 2 accounts)-Hey, take a look at our project @LuminCoin, the first DAO of monetary policies.(counts as 1 stake)-Where do you guyes find new projects?-LuminCoin is cool, haha.-You from the project?-No, but I like the idea, first one I saw that you could have monetary policies like traditional currencies.(counts as 3 daily stakes, if posted in a non-spam active group from 2 accounts)-Why do so many coins now do transaction taxes: l-I'm an ambassador for LuminCoin, you may check ours, no taxes-What's it about-A coin for direct democracy over monetary policies, future DAO. (counts as 3 daily stakes, if posted in a non-spam active group from 2 accounts)-I'm LuminCoin's ambassador, it's designed to be strictly better than centralized currencies, if you want to know a bit about the system, you might ask me.(any follow-up question counts towards 1 daily stake)Preferable groups:Check the spreadsheet  to see the list of preferred Telegram groups for shilling.How to join:Fill out the registration form here:Telegram Campaign Report Fromat: (Post the links to your posts or screenshots in this thread every 1-7 days as a new post. Stakes will be counted on a daily basis. Do not quote or edit your previous report.)Code:Telgram Campaign ReportForum Username:Telegram Account(s):For Days: XXOther Group Post Link 1 Other Group Post Link 2Other Group Post Link 3Bounty Awards:Daily Stake = Self Post Stake + Group Post StakeSelf Post Stake:Make 1 post or repost about LuminCoin (can't repost same post twice)- Account with 400-1500 friends/followers : 1 stake/day- Account with 1501-5000 friends/followers: 2 stakes/day- Account with 5001-10000 friends/followers: 5 stakes/day- Account with 10,001+ friends/followers: 8 stakes/dayGroup Post Stake:Make 1 post or repost about LuminCoin in groups below or similar groups:1 stake/daySample Groups:  Check the spreadsheet  to see the list of sample Facebook groups for shilling.Rules:●Facebook account must have a minimum of 400 friends/followers for self post stakes●Must like the Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Lumin-Coin-109214571858497/● Contents can be from the website, gitbook, official FB page or twitter account (all links at the top of the post). May include hashtags like #LuminCoin #BestDAO #DirectDemocracy #MemeCoin, and LuminCoin's website/twitter link How to join:Fill out the registration form here: Facebook Campaign Report Format:(Post all the links to your work in this thread every 1-7 days as a new post. Stakes will be counted on a daily basis. Do not quote or edit your previous report.)Code:Facebook Campaign ReportForum Username:Facebook Profile Link:For Days: XXself post/repost Link 1self post/repost Link 2…group post/repost Link 1group post/repost Link 2…Bounty Awards: Junior members: 5 Stakes/weekFull members: 10 Stakes/weekSenior member: 15 Stakes/week Hero member: 25 Stakes/week Legendary member: 35 Stakes/weekRules & requirements 1. Wear the necessary signature 2. Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts each week to be eligible for Payout. 3. A maximum of 4 Posts will be counted daily. 4. Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds and posts in other signature thread or in this thread will not count towards stakes.5. You can't participate in any other signature campaign during your campaigning week. If you do, you would be disqualified.scroll down to the bottom of the post to copy the signature codes." How to join:Fill out the registration form here: Signature Campain Report Format:(This report is weekly.)Code:Signature Campaign For Week XXForum Username:Forum Profile Link: Bouty Awards:Video Award = 1 stake x subscriber multiplier x subscriber authenticity multiplier x video quality multiplier           (1 stake is the base video award) Subscriber multiplier:300-1500 subscribers: 11501-5000 subscribers: 35001-10000 subscribers: 510001+ subscribers: 8subscriber authenticity score: 0.3-1.25, based on manual check video quality multiplier: 0.5-1.5 based on manual checkRules:● Each participant can send:- YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )- Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of text about the LuminCoin project● The text can include:This is first crypto currency that facilitates direct democracy over monetary policies.Revolutionary community banking in lieu of central banking.LuminCoin Presale will be live on 28th on pinksaleor other related things from the website, gitbook, twitter or medium (links at the top of the post)or some hashtags like #LuminCoin #BestDAO #DirectDemocracy #MemeCoin #BSCGemInclude some links to the project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or other social media.(Website: lumintoken.com Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/LuminCoin Telegram:https://t.me/LuminCoin Discord:https://discord.gg/HHtXCUJSCS Pinksale:)●Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the video description or at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. ● Only original video content will be accepted. Copletely copying others' videos will not count.● Videos should not be removed. Removal/deletion will nullify stakes.● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials. How to join:Fill out the registration form here:Video Campain Report Format:(Weekly Report.)Code:Video Campaign Report- Forum Username:- For Week: XX- Youtube Video Link:- TikTok Video Link: Bounty Awards:High Quality : 10 Stakes/weekGood Quality: 8 Stakes/weekAverage Quality : 5 Stakes/weekLow Quality : 2 Stakes/weekTasks and requirements:1. Article written has to contain original information, copying entirely from others will be counted as low quality2. Each participants is entitled to 1 post per week on different platforms like: Medium, Steemit, Linkedin, Facebook 3. The content must link to the website and to our official broker:4. All languages are accepted, but the language sould be in accordance with the posting platform's main usersReferences:http://lumintoken.com/https://medium.com/@LuminResearch/the-secret-plan-for-illuminati-coin-only-between-the-illuminati-382b5b4f72eahttps://www.marketwatch.com/press-release/illuminati-coin-meet-the-illuminati-pup-that-rules-the-doggy-world-2022-06-15?mod=search_headlinehttps://lumincoin.gitbook.io/documentation How to join:Fill out the registration form here: Article Campain Report Format:(Weekly Report)Code:Article Campaign Report- Forum Username:- For Week: XX- Article Link: Bounty Awards:Daily Award = 1 stake x karma multiplier                (1 stake is the base stake/day)karma multiplier is based on total karma received on the post/comment at the time of reporting:0-1 karma x12-5 karma x26-10 karma x310+ karma x4Rules●Participants must make 1 post and 1 reply to receive the daily stake.●The posts and comments should not be shadowbanned/removed by either the Reddit admins or the subreddit mods.Check the spreadsheet  to see the list of sample subreddits for shilling. How to join:Fill out the registration form here: Reddit Campain Report Format:(Post the links to your posts in this thread every 1-7 days as a new post. Stakes will be counted on a daily basis. Do not quote or edit your previous report.)Code:Reddit Campaign Report- Forum Username:- Reddit Username:- For date(s): XX- Reddit Post Link#1....- Reddit Comment Link #1....
